description: Our standard room offers a comfortable king size bed and modern amenities such as a flat screen TV and free WiFi. Perfect for couples or solo travelers.
Our standard room offers a cozy queen size bed and modern amenities such as a flat screen TV and free WiFi. Perfect for couples or solo travelers.

Our deluxe room offers a spacious king size bed, modern amenities such as a flat screen TV and free WiFi, and a private balcony with stunning views. Perfect for couples or solo travelers looking for a touch of luxury.

Our deluxe room offers a spacious king size bed, modern amenities such as a flat screen TV and free WiFi, and a private jacuzzi for ultimate relaxation. Perfect for couples or solo travelers looking for a luxurious experience.
